Title: The migrant population is becoming increasingly active
Designer: Hunan and Hubei Population Policy Propaganda and Education Center (湖南、湖北省计划生育宣传教育中心)
Publisher: Hunansheng xinwen tupianshe (湖南省新闻图片社)
Notes: Part of an incomplete series of posters, The state of the Chinese population charts (Zhongguo renkou guoqing jiaoyu guatu 中国人口国情教育挂图), published in the 1990s.The direction of the migration trend is given: from rural village to small- and medium-sized town, to large town, to abroad.
